condense.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a gas condenses, or is condensed, it becomes a liquid
condense.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the mist which condensed on every cold surface
The gaseous metal is cooled and condenses into liquid zinc.
condense.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information
condense.translation[0].definitions[1].e: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
condense.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to make a liquid thicker by removing some of the water
